channel.title: iDigital

item.title: My friend, 61, signed a $20K contract for dental implants. She can’t afford it. Can she fight it?
item.description: “After her room and board is paid at the assisted-living home, she has $9,000 left for the year.”

item.title: Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway boosted Mitsubishi and Mitsui stakes. Why he’s enamored with Japan.
item.description: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has boosted its stake in Mitsubishi and Mitsui, further increasing a long-standing bet on Japanese trading houses.

item.title: Think the S&P 500 is too expensive? Check out these ETFs instead.

item.title: How procedural memory can cut the cost and complexity of AI agents
